channel.title: Good coders or senior members plz help!
channel.description: hi when i make a new shop i get no errors and i change everything right so when i go to trade i get connection lost what i do? :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Good coders or senior members plz help!
item.dc:creator: @ozzygold ozzygold
item.description:
@ozzygold wrote:

yep and i dont get any errors i just have not idea why it wont work[br][size=1]Posted at: December 07, 2006, 11:22:46 PM[/size][hr]il tell ya what i type
auto spawn.cfg

spawn = 544(tab)3238(tab)3433(tab)0(tab)3238(tab)3433(tab)3238(tab)3433(tab)1(tab)fancy dress shopkeeper

client java

} else if (NPCID == 544) { //rare shop 2 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; // fancy dress shopkeeper

shops.cfg

shop = 41	rares_shop_2					2	2	2639	100	2641	100	2643	100	2633	100	2635	100	2637	100	6722	100	7592	100	7593	100	7594	100	7595	100	7596	100

item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Hmmm… what NPC are you using for it? Because if the NPC didn’t already have a trade option, it will cause huge problems for you.

item.title: Good coders or senior members plz help!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Most servers dissconnect you when you try to trade an npc. It’s a real bitch to fix. Keep studying the methods in the client, and you’ll understand it soon enough.
